[[Image:Blackcrown Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Blackcrown on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Blackcrown''' is a castle in [[the Reach]], the region controlled by [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. The castle is located south-west of Highgarden and [[Oldtown]], on the northern side of Whispering Sound, the estuary of the River [[Honeywine]]. The castle overlooks the [[Redwyne Straits]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/highgarden/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Highgarden entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Blackcrown is the seat of House Bulwer.
